website_summaries.verdict: The next logical step for those who have outgrown basic hair removal strips and lotions, but are nervous about trying hot wax at home.
pros: The wax-based gel gets warm from your body heat – no microwave or plug-in warmer required
If you spill or make a mistake, the paraben-free gel washes off easily with water
cons: The strips included in the kit are washable and reusable, but you’ll need to order extra if you want to remove hair from a large area in one sitting

customer_reviews.title: I have been using nads for years like other reviewers here
customer_reviews.text: I have been using nads for years like other reviewers here, the only complaint I have is that you have to get the consistency just right using heat and make sure that you are not sweating or that the room is not hot otherwise it will not be as effective.
